sub_title: Senior Test Engineer in the high-tech electronics and semiconductor industry
summary:
I am a Test Development Engineer with more than 20 years’ experience in the high-tech electronics and semiconductor industry. Especially experienced in test development with specialization in integrated circuits of Mixed Signal, Automotive Networking and Automotive Led Drivers. 

As a test development engineer I prefer both defining test hardware and developing test software on (semi-) Automated Test Equipment (ATE). Finding best and most simple solution as possible is one of my personal skills. Hence simple solutions can easily be used and transferred to other colleagues. Working together with multi-disciplinary project teams achieving project milestones is another personal skill. I am enthusiastic working with DSP (Digital Signal Processing) based test methods, Design-for-Testability (DfT) techniques and very interested in RF testing techniques.

I am an easy going, accurate, self starting, problem solving attitude, driven, out of the box thinking person with a sense of humor. I like to work in an ambitious and result driven working environment in which personal development is stimulated. I am eager to develop both my test development skills and knowledge and like to work together with multi-disciplinary teams.

Knowledge of Unix, Linux, Pascal, C, C++, data analysis (DataPower), RF, ADC, IFAD, digital circuits, PLL, MTP (Multiple Time Programmable non-volatile memory), LabVIEW, Minitab and SVN versioning software. 

Experienced on ATE platforms Teradyne A575, Agilent 93k, SPEA 372MX and knowledge of LTX-C.

profile_positions.description:
Market segment medical diagnostic and analysis systems. Neways Advanced Applications B.V. in Son.
•	Developed transfer strategy for different kinds of PCBAs.
•	Developed a method for on-the-fly mechanical tuning of, for example, a damping circuit in a test fixture. 
•	Defined test fixture hardware to measure the temperature of a resistor using a close focus IR sensor.
profile_positions.title: Test Development Engineer Lead (member of project core team)

profile_positions.description:
Product Line Solid State Lighting, Led Driver IC's, ATE platform SPEA 372MX.
•	Implemented the MTP (Multiple Time Programmable non-volatile memory) test flow in all test
        stages of the test program.
•	Developed a function to determine all failing test pattern cycles on the SPEA tester.
•	Realization of first time right test hardware for mass production. 
•	Creating test plan and documentation based on the V-model.
•	Developing both hard- and software for mass production according to the test specification as
        well as the test production rules using Design-for-Testability (DfT) techniques.
•	Reporting project progress according to the Business Creation and Management model. 
•	Creating and guarding planning of delivery of project milestones for own and outsourced tasks.
•	Performing Repeatability & reproducibility (R&r) study as well as data analysis (DataPower).
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Development Engineer Lead (member of project core team)

profile_positions.description:
Product Line In Vehicle Networking, Flex Ray IC's, ATE platform SPEA 372MX.
•	Implemented a test method for measuring PCB trace lengths on the ATE. 
•	Set up a teamwork environment for developing the industrial test program. 
•	Created a shmoo function on the SPEA tester. 
•	Creating test plan and documentation using Design-for-Testability (DfT) techniques.
•	Realization of Test program release for mass production in Thailand.
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Development Engineer Lead (member of project core team)

profile_positions.description:
Business Line Connected Entertainment, portable radio IC's, ATE platform Agilent 93k.
•	Responsible for Test Development on IP blocks such as RDS, I2C and SPI using DSP (Digital Signal Processing) based test methods and Design-for-Testability (DfT) techniques.
•	Set up of a teamwork environment for developing the industrial test program.
•	Covering all the test development aspects from business creation up to mass production.	
•	Realization of Test Program release for mass production in Taiwan.
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Development Engineer Lead (member of project core team)

profile_positions.description:
Business Line Car Entertainment, CarDSP IC's, ATE platform Teradyne A575 / Agilent 93k.

•	Responsible for Test Development of IP blocks such as IFAD, PLL, ADC and Oscillator using DSP (Digital Signal Processing) based test methods and Design-for-Testability (DfT) techniques.
•	Developed a library function for measuring audio IP blocks on the Verigy ATE tester.
•	Covering all the test development aspects from business creation up to mass production.
•	Realization of Test program release for mass production in Taiwan.
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Development Engineer Lead (member of project core team)

profile_positions.description:
Product Line Optical Networking, Interface IC's, ATE platform Teradyne A575.
•	Responsible for Test Development of both limiting amplifier(1.25Gb/s) and mux/demux(622Mb/s).
•	Covering all the Test Development aspects from business creation up to mass production.
•	Realization of Test Program release for mass production in both Taiwan and Thailand.

profile_positions.description:
IC Test Fab, Department Consumer IC.
•	Responsible for maintaining, checking and calibrating the IC test systems (ATEs).
•	Responsible for maintaining contacts with internal vendors as well as with external vendors.
•	Participating in projects like evaluation and introduction of new test systems.
profile_positions.title: Equipment Engineer Lead IC Test Fab
